content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe Trabelsi, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting the space, but I am afraid that I cannot accept your offer at this time. The apartment is quite small, measuring only 25 square meters, and I believe that it would not be suitable for your needs. Additionally, I am concerned about the potential damage that may occur during your tenancy. I understand that you may have other options available to you, so I suggest that we terminate our negotiations at this time. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand, Mister Heine. Thank you for your time. I will look for other options.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: You're welcome, Nesibe. I'm sorry to hear that my offer was not suitable for your needs. I hope that you are able to find a more suitable rental option. If you have any other questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Mister Heine, I have another question. What is the minimum rental price for this apartment?

I understand that the apartment is small, but I am willing to pay a lower price for the space.

I hope that you can accept my offer.

Thank you for your time.

Best regards,

Nesibe Trabelsi
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Hello Nesibe, thank you for your follow-up question. I apologize for any confusion, but I am unable to provide you with a specific minimum rental price for the apartment. The rental price will depend on various factors, including the location, the condition of the apartment, and the demand for rental properties in the area.

I understand that the apartment is small, but I am still unable to accept your offer at this time. As I mentioned earlier, I am concerned about the potential damage that may occur during your tenancy. I hope that you are able to find a more suitable rental option. If you have any other questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Heinrich Heine
